Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory417.jpg'}
{1: 'Monday, rainy', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Atlantis is receiving another batch of newcomers today.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "As the principal supervisor of the restoration project, I'm happy to see new folks join all of us here at this relic from the Golden Age.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Looking back now, I still remember the first day I came here as vividly as though it were yesterday.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Marine Fortress, Oceanic Miracle, Waterborne Crown—these praises crossed my mind when I first saw this construction guarded by the seven spires.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Nothing, however, sounded more fitting than its own name—Atlantis.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'To preserve this moment of astonishment, I decided to keep a diary of my work life here.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}

{1: "The Omega File brought out of this research center has since become Babylonia's trump card, but the real value of the research center still lies dormant.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Aside from the strategic value Atlantis provides as a marine fortress, the papers and books found on the terminals left here also hold great value for us.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Technological Gaps—this is what I learned as a student in my first lesson at the Center of Basic Public Education.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Our knowledge base, according to the instructor, is missing a few things in comparison to that of the Golden Age.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "And it was when we were introduced to all the formulae and theories I'd never seen before that I had a real taste of what that meant.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'To those working here in the past, the papers and books were probably something that they killed time with.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Now, however, they're vital pieces to fill the missing gaps with.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}

{1: 'I remember seeing how the archaeological team broke down in tears seeing those words. Some of them were teachers from the Golden Age... I think?', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'When the archaeological team was done milking this place totally dry...', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '"Milking dry" sounds overly accusative, but given their fanatical attitudes, this seems the best way to describe them.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '...The stationed personnel proceeded with restoration as planned.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Everything had gone smoothly to begin with—the zero-point reactor was completely shut off, eliminating all possibilities of reactivation.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'On top of it, with the control system rebooted and excessive data removed, we made sure this research center would never spin out of control again.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}

{1: 'But while Atlantis had survived the Punishing, years of lack of proper maintenance had still done a number on it.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'To further complicate matters, the technology with which some of the structures were made happens to be one of those that humanity has lost.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Fortunately, the engineers came forth with their solutions. "There are always more solutions than problems to be solved."—the teacher was indeed right.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory416.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Supervisor', 3: "Phew... Guess this is where I'm calling it a day.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Checking the time on her terminal, the woman with glasses closes her diary and puts it away in a drawer.'}
{2: 'Supervisor', 3: 'Never thought the guys at the security department would say yes. Am I lucky or what?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She goes down memory lane as she trains her eyes on the drawer where the diary is kept.'}
{2: 'Supervisor', 3: 'But they only allow papers to be used for recording things. Guess that makes it easier for them to check?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Feeling a sore in her eye, she lifts her glasses and rubs her eyes.'}
{2: 'Supervisor', 3: 'Time to get to work.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She stands up. When the door beeps open, she sees someone she never expected.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Supervisor', 3: 'Ryan, what are you doing here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Supervisor', 3: "What's that supposed to mean?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Apparently taken by surprise, Ryan lets out a shriek that hardly befits that handsome face of his.'}
{2: 'Supervisor', 3: 'Lost again? The medical department is down that way.', 4: '1'}
{3: "She remembers this young man. Quiet and inarticulate, but he never misses a thing when it comes to the medical tasks he's assigned."}

{2: 'Supervisor', 3: 'This research center is so big that people get lost even with a map in hand, so you need to hammer into your head the path you need to take to get back to your department. Understood?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It takes Ryan a good few seconds to nod his head.'}
{3: 'Right when the woman turns around ready to head to work, she hears someone saying "Thank you" from behind her.'}
{2: 'Ryan', 3: 'Thank you.'}
{2: 'Supervisor', 3: "(That's a first, huh?)", 4: '1'}
{3: "Without giving it more thought, she heads toward where she's supposed to go."}
